You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

• CA Data Minder Data Protection / Orchestria technical lead. Supported all aspects of multi-tiered digital loss prevention (DLP) application infrastructure. Architected and implemented upgrades from v4.7 through v15.2, including 8000+ client agent distribution. Implemented Oracle partition maintenance and data purging. Managed automated user Hierarchy via advanced LDAP queries through HR re-orgs and various custom business requirements. Built Vbscript applets to pro-actively warn the team of upstream message issues and ingestion delays (~1 million message per day loads).• Oracle Enterprise Performance Management (Hyperion/Brio) Reporting. Administration, reporting, dashboard design and implementation, SQL data-mining and query optimization. Architected upgrades from version 6, 8, 9 to EPM 11. Created interactive dashboards to extend application functionality to various internal user applications. Worked directly with business users to gather requirements for various regulatory and metrics based scheduled and ad-hoc reports. Began migration to Tableau/Alteryx foundation.• Performed multiple upgrades on Linux and Windows, patching, and security hardening including SSL configuration and maintenance. Gathered requirements, architected solution, managed implementation resources, and performed final implementation. Created, documented and tested DR plans for each upgrade. Utilized Agile and RUP methodologies, as well as JIRA and Remedy based project tracking.• Supported Oracle/Mantas Insight -- a Compliance and Risk Behavior Detection (Pattern Based Detection) application used for anti-fraud, AML (anti-money laundering), broker monitoring, ect. On-Call for ESP/Autosys based nightly batch comprised of hundreds of data loading, aggregating, and algorithm jobs. Troubleshooting included: Linux shell scripts, Oracle table loading via Informatica, SQL query optimization, and view and procedure issues.

•	Windows infrastructure administrator for 1000+ server raised floor environment •	Support and implementation for hardware life cycle including: Server implementation, monitoring, break/fix, disaster recover (DR), emergency patching.•	Technologies included: Active Directory, Exchange, Clustering, Printing, Vendor Applications, SAN (Hitachi / McData) and NAS.•	Data security officer for 1000 user environment. Managed virus updates on servers and desktops.•	Advanced Vbscript design. Created Active Directory monitoring tool to remove disabled user data and DFS links. Built automation and monitoring tools as needed to increase productivity.•	Legato/Alphastor tape library backup / restores (including full Exchange recovery).•	Scripted application deployments to Windows desktops using WISE, Vbscript and batch scripts.

• Obtained Series 7 and 63 licenses. Performed continuing education and both licenses are still active as of 2015.• Analyzed trading activity for violations. Worked with risk management team to mitigate financial risk of various trading scenarios.  • Served as escalation point for Schwab branch and call center representatives to explain complex margins and options trading details on customer accounts. Worked directly with customers to resolve trading violations, margin calls, and risk related sell-outs.

Supported financial unit of the CME clearing house. Analyzed financial data of member firms and settlement banks. Performed twice daily options settlement cycle that entailed wiring millions of dollars via the Fed wire under high-pressure time constraints.
